Articles.Content:
Hello! This is my KSP interpretation of the infamous MiG-21. Enjoy!

Specs

**Max range @100% throttle @ ~100m alt**: 187km

**Max Speed**:1,310 m/s @ ~100m alt

**Launch weight**: 9.9 tons

**Crew**: 1

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ylR5I)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/luixaxefioeq417/MiG-21%20Fishbed.craft?dl=0)

**Modded version (uses** [**BDArmory**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/90/BahamutoDs%20Armory) **and** [**BD Dynamics**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/101/Bahamuto_Dynamics_Parts_pack_v1.1)**)**

MiG-21 Interceptor role (Air-to-Air)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/77dm52od36cnihb/MiG-21%20%28BD%20A-A%29.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-28T06:06:01Z" title="08/28/2015 06:06  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 28, 2015</time> by Yaeah**

If only KSP allowed engine failures, as well as the terrible flight characteristics the -21 has at low level. Otherwise, I like this replica ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) (i just wish we were able to model characteristics of aircraft better) .

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-13T15:16:32Z" title="08/13/2015 03:16  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 13, 2015</time> by JDarksword**
